text: Press the %action% to interact.
Use it to interact with characters, chests, or doors.
Press the %inventory% to access your inventory,
where you can view your equipment, stats, skills, and spells.
Press the %logbook% to access your logbook.
Here, you can find all quest-related information.
Approaching an enemy triggers a battle.
Victory in battles rewards you with XP,
which can be used to improve your character.
Toggle the %slow% to move stealthily.
Enemies will have a harder time detecting you,
enabling you to avoid battles if necessary.
Press the %minimap% in large areas to view an overview of that area.
This helps prevent getting lost, especially in dark caves.
(Note: Small areas do not offer this overview option.)
During conversations with other characters,
you have the opportunity to choose your responses.
But certain responses are restricted by specific conditions.
These conditions are stated between brackets %brackets% in front of the response.
Press the %inventory% to access your inventory.
Here, you can equip various items such as armor and weapons.
This game does NOT autosave regularly.
So make sure to save your game when necessary.
In this case, the fairy in the upper right corner can assist you with that.
Toggle the %fast% to run.
You'll move faster, but enemies will detect you more easily.
If you missed any of these messages or want to review them,
press the %manual% to see the history of these messages.
Remember to press the %minimap% to view the area overview,
and the %logbook% to access your logbook.
Here, you can find all quest-related information.
The closet behind you can be used for storage.
When your inventory becomes full, store items in your closet.
They will be safe and kept there until you need them.
Luana has joined your party.
Press the %inventory% to view her equipment, stats and skills.
People may share different information at different times.
Keep this in mind!
